DOC.brief_summary: Quality of Life (QoL) in Korean postmenopausal osteoporosis patients with bisphosphonate treatment
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life(QoL) in Korean Postmenopausal Osteoporosis Patients With Bisphosphonate Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Cross-sectional quality of life survey using self-administered OPSAT-QTM questionnaire in Korean postmenopausal osteoporosis patients with bisphosphonate treatment
DOC.criteria: Who have been diagnosed with postmenopausal osteoporosis by physician Who have received any oral bisphosphonates (weekly or monthly) at least for 2 months to provide answer of OPSATQTM questionnaire Who provide informed consent for study participation Do not understand the contents of the questionnaire
